thread.title: Blue Jays' Jose Bautista 'caught ... ridin' dirty'
thread.title_full: Blue Jays' Jose Bautista 'caught ... ridin' dirty'

title: Blue Jays' Jose Bautista 'caught ... ridin' dirty'
text:
Blue Jays' Jose Bautista 'caught ... ridin' dirty' 
Postmedia Network Thursday, October 15, 2015 08:40 PM EDT | Updated: Thursday, October 15, 2015 08:48 PM EDT Blue Jays' Jose Bautista reacts after he is safe at second during third inning action against the Rangers in Game 5 of the AL Division Series in Toronto on Wednesday, Oct. 14, 2015. (Stan Behal/Toronto Sun) 
So how did Jose Bautista cap off his game-winning home run for the Toronto Blue Jays to clinch their AL Division Series on Wednesday night? 
By being as low-key as possible. 
Bautista, who swatted a three-run home run against the Texas Rangers during a crazy seventh inning that lasted nearly an hour, went home late in the evening on a kick scooter. 
Matthew King snapped a photo of the Jays outfielder riding home and posted the image to his Instagram account @kingermr . 
Bautista confirmed it was him on the scooter Thursday evening and reposted it with the tagline "Caught me ridin' dirty..." after TSN promoted the image on Instagram. A photo posted by Jose Bautista (@joeybats19) on Oct 15, 2015 at 3:13pm PDT Sponsored Links
